title: BTCOVERFIATS
author: BTCOVERFIATS
created_time: November 22, 2022, 09:09:41 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 02:18:13 AM by BTCOVERFIATS
content: I am excited to be running my 2nd auction here on the forum! I am auctioning off my Open Edition signs from Cryptograffiti’s upcoming “NO CBDC” campaign.Cryptograffiti is currently getting his NO CBDC campaign started. I was lucky enough to help him out by taking one of the videos he needed for the project in NYC with one of the signs he sent me! Check out my part of the video here: https://imgur.com/WKmwTCT Here are some pictures of the signs:Only one of the signs is signed by the artist Cryptograffiti, the red one is not. Only the red “Stop Central Bank Digital Currencies” was used for the upcoming campaign video hence the double sided tape on the back. Stickers will be included!AUCTION TERMSItem for Sale:  2 Cryptograffiti Open Edition signs (One signed by artist)Dimensions: 18in length x 12in widthBid Format:   BTCStarting Bid: 0.03 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.001 BTCAuction End Time: Sunday, November 27th @ 6pm EST  countdown clock...https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/launch?iso=20221127T18&p0=179&msg=Cryptograffiti+Auction+by+BTCOVERFIATS&font=serif&csz=1Sniping:  No sniping. 10 minute standard sniping rule. Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from USA. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/dutiesPayment Address: Will provide once auction is overPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer via MinerJones

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: these are awesome! so are the stickers!
